00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Expression/LiteralValue.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Schema/DataType.h>
00028 
00029 /// \brief
00030 /// The FdoDataValue class derives from FdoLiteralValue and represents a literal
00031 /// value such as a string or a number.
00032 class FdoDataValue : public FdoLiteralValue
00033 {
00034 protected:
00035 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00036     /// \brief
00037     ///  Constructs a default instance of an FdoDataValue with data type string and a
00038     /// value of null.
00039     /// 
00040     /// \return
00041     /// Returns nothing
00042     /// 
00043     FdoDataValue();
00044 /// \endcond
00045 
00046 public:
00047     /// \brief
00048     /// Constructs an instance of a null FdoDataValue using the specified arguments.
00049     /// 
00050     /// \param dataType 
00051     /// Input data type
00052     /// 
00053     /// \return
00054     /// Returns nothing
00055     /// 
00056     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(FdoDataType dataType);
00057 
00058     /// \brief
00059     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoBooleanValue using the specified argument.
00060     /// 
00061     /// \param value 
00062     /// Input a Boolean value
00063     /// 
00064     /// \return
00065     /// Returns an FdoBooleanValue
00066     /// 
00067     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(bool value);
00068 
00069     /// \brief
00070     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoByteValue using the specified argument.
00071     /// 
00072     /// \param value 
00073     /// Input a byte
00074     /// 
00075     /// \return
00076     /// Returns an FdoByteValue
00077     /// 
00078     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisByte value);
00079 
00080     /// \brief
00081     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoDateTimeValue using the specified argument.
00082     /// 
00083     /// \param value 
00084     /// Input a GisDateTime
00085     /// 
00086     /// \return
00087     /// Returns an FdoDateTimeValue
00088     /// 
00089     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisDateTime value);
00090 
00091     /// \brief
00092     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoDecimalValue or FdoDoubleValue using 
00093     /// the specified arguments.
00094     /// 
00095     /// \param value 
00096     /// Input a double
00097     /// \param dataType 
00098     /// Input a data type
00099     /// 
00100     /// \return
00101     /// Returns an FdoDecimalValue or FdoDoubleValue
00102     /// 
00103     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(double value, FdoDataType dataType);
00104 
00105     /// \brief
00106     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoInt16Value using the specified argument.
00107     /// 
00108     /// \param value 
00109     /// Input a 16 bit integer
00110     /// 
00111     /// \return
00112     /// Returns an FdoInt16Value
00113     /// 
00114     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisInt16 value);
00115 
00116     /// \brief
00117     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoInt32Value using the specified argument.
00118     /// 
00119     /// \param value 
00120     /// Input a 32 bit integer
00121     /// 
00122     /// \return
00123     /// Returns an FdoInt32Value
00124     /// 
00125     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisInt32 value);
00126 
00127     /// \brief
00128     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoInt64Value using the specified argument.
00129     /// 
00130     /// \param value 
00131     /// Input a 64 bit integer
00132     /// 
00133     /// \return
00134     /// Returns an FdoInt64Value
00135     /// 
00136     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisInt64 value);
00137 
00138     /// \brief
00139     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoSingleValue using the specified argument.
00140     /// 
00141     /// \param value 
00142     /// Input a single precision floating point value
00143     /// 
00144     /// \return
00145     /// Returns an FdoSingleValue
00146     /// 
00147     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(float value);
00148 
00149     /// \brief
00150     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoStringValue using the specified argument.
00151     /// 
00152     /// \param value 
00153     /// Input a character string
00154     /// 
00155     /// \return
00156     /// Returns an FdoStringValue
00157     /// 
00158     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisString* value);
00159 
00160     /// \brief
00161     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoBLOBValue or FdoCLOBValue using the specified arguments.
00162     /// 
00163     /// \param value 
00164     /// Input a byte array
00165     /// \param length 
00166     /// Input the length of the byte array
00167     /// \param dataType 
00168     /// Input the type of value to create
00169     /// 
00170     /// \return
00171     /// Returns an FdoBLOBValue or an FdoCLOBValue
00172     /// 
00173     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisByte* value, GisInt32 length, FdoDataType dataType);
00174 
00175     /// \brief
00176     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoBLOBValue or FdoCLOBValue using the specified arguments.
00177     /// 
00178     /// \param value 
00179     /// Input a byte array
00180     /// \param dataType 
00181     /// Input the type of value to create
00182     /// 
00183     /// \return
00184     /// Returns an FdoBLOBValue or an FdoCLOBValue
00185     /// 
00186     FDO_API static FdoDataValue* Create(GisByteArray* value, FdoDataType dataType);
00187 
00188     /// \brief
00189     /// Gets the data type of the FdoDataValue.
00190     /// 
00191     /// \return
00192     /// Returns an FdoDataType
00193     /// 
00194     FDO_API virtual FdoDataType GetDataType() = 0;
00195 
00196     /// \brief
00197     /// Returns true if the FdoDataValue represents a null value.
00198     /// 
00199     /// \return
00200     /// Returns true if the FdoDataValue represents a null value
00201     /// 
00202     FDO_API virtual bool IsNull();
00203 
00204     /// \brief
00205     /// Sets the FdoDataValue to a null value of the specified type.
00206     /// 
00207     /// \return
00208     /// Returns nothing
00209     /// 
00210     FDO_API virtual void SetNull();
00211 
00212     static FdoDataValue* Create(GisString* value, FdoDataType dataType);
00213 
00214     static GisString* GetStringValue(FdoDataValue* dataValue);
00215 
00216 protected:
00217 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00218     bool        m_isNull;
00219 };
00220 /// \endcond
00221 
00222 /// \brief
00223 /// FdoDataValueP is a GisPtr on FdoDataValue, provided for convenience.
00224 typedef GisPtr<FdoDataValue> FdoDataValueP;
